mapper.select: select reply_number, reply_content, reply_date, board_number, r.member_number, member_id from tbl_member m join tbl_reply r on board_number = #{boardNumber} and m.member_number = r.member_number
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply(reply_number, reply_content, board_number, member_number) values(seq_reply.nextVal, #{replyContent}, #{boardNumber}, #{memberNumber})
